name: ORBY 2.0
description:
ORBY returns!

- interconnected metroid-venia style map!
- squishy animations!
- loot boxes!
- rollback netcode! (single-player only)
- a variety of skins and customizations!
- fully fleshed out original soundtrack!
- be a slave to the capital!

download for free and play the epic adventure of a miner and his orb companion!
